Description: This module can be used to retrieve variants present in specific samples. The sample names can be selected from the dynamically populated dropdown list from the IndividualID field defined in the PED file.

Parameters:

Chose Genotype: The user can chose the genotype of the variants: HET (heterozygous), HOM_ALT (homozygous alternate) or HET HOM_ALT (heterozygous and homozygous) from the dropdown list.

Minimum count: Minimum number of samples to have the chosen genotype can be set using the ‘Count’ parameter.

Required columns in PED file:

IndividualID, Population and Gender fields are mandatory for population module while other optional fields can be present. Gender could be coded as male/female or 1 for males and 2 for females and NA if unavailable.
